module.title: Manage: Bookmarks
module.description: Basic management of noted links for use on e.G. HTML-Editors or some sort of stored locations or blog article references.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>bookmarks`; CREATE TABLE `<%?prefix%>bookmarks` ( `bookmarkId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `url` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `checkedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `usedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bookmarkId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `url` (`url`) ) ENGINE=InnoDBDEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
